body.p: The playbooks are intended to be used to deploy a new environment. You should only use them for Day 0 deployment purposes.
The Ansible log is stored in the ops folder (/root//ops). If the deployment fails, you may find useful hints in this log.
To see how to check if your certs have been deployed correctly, see Appendix D.
If you have installed Grafana, you will be asked to reset the default admin password the first time you access the user interface.
